description.value: When rolling Psychic Phenomenon, can discard result, take 1d5 Corruption, and roll again with no modifiers. Mutually exclusive with Rite of Sanctioning Talent, cannot have both.

system.benefit: When rolling Psychic Phenomenon, can discard result, take 1d5 Corruption, and roll again with no modifiers. Mutually exclusive with Rite of Sanctioning Talent, cannot have both.
